vote.title:
To authorize the issuance of limited tax bonds in an amount not to exceed $37,300,000 for economic and community development-related projects; and to declare an emergency ($37,300,000.00).

Section 44-1(b) of the City Charter.
vote.description:
Explanation
 
This ordinance authorizes the issuance of limited tax bonds in an amount not to exceed $37,300,000 for economic and community development-related projects ($37,300,000).
 
Title
 
To authorize the issuance of limited tax bonds in an amount not to exceed $37,300,000 for economic and community development-related projects; and to declare an emergency ($37,300,000.00).
 
Section 44-1(b) of the City Charter.
 
 
Body
 
See attached file: City of Columbus - 2022 New Money Bonds - Limited Tax Econ. Commun. Ordinance
